      • copyObject

        public static void copyObject(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext,
              java.lang.String sourcePath,
              java.lang.String file,
              java.lang.String targetDir)
                       throws javax.servlet.ServletException
        Copies images, templates, etc. from the WAR to TRACKPLUS_HOME. Original files are overwritten unless they have been modified. Modification is checked via an MD5 digest.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException

      • initGroovyPlugins

        public static void initGroovyPlugins(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)

      • copyAndMergeQuartzJobsFile

        public static void copyAndMergeQuartzJobsFile(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext,
                              java.lang.String propFile)
                                       throws javax.servlet.ServletException
        Copies quartz-jobs.xml file from the WAR to TRACKPLUS_HOME if it does not exist there yet. If it exists there check if it contains the password token clean job and if not add it to the file.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException

      • copyAndMergeLog4j2File

        public static void copyAndMergeLog4j2File(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext,
                          java.lang.String propFile)
                                   throws javax.servlet.ServletException
        Copies log4j2.xml file from the WAR to TRACKPLUS_HOME if it does not exist there yet. In this process it changes the location of the logger output.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException

      • fileIsTheOriginal

        public static boolean fileIsTheOriginal(java.io.File existingFile,
                        java.lang.String hash)
        Checks if the file with this name has been modified in the meantime. For this we compute the files hash value and look if it exists in the hash.txt file where we keep them.
        Parameters:
        existingFile -
        targetDirAbsolutePath -
        Returns:
